page.title: 10BRIGHTON CROSS
page.content: This little settlement is at the cross roads of the A39 and the main road from Newquay to St Austell. Over the years many accidents have happened here and the crossing has been continuously improved. There is a garage here and across the road a recently opened cafe. At the cafe there is a park for lorries in which most lorry drivers sleep in their cabs over night or they may stay in a room at the rear of the cafe where there are toilets, showers and a television room. The cafe is open for meals all day, the most populuar being mixed grills.In the summer the cafe is open longer because of holidaymakers. Outside the cafe there is a breakdown service because there are many crashes on the cross road.Petrol and diesel are available as is a telephone.
